item.title: Three Levels of Customer Explanations for Data Science
item.description: Every customer is different. That seems obvious until they begin to ask you specific questions about your work - or they don’t ask anything at all. It is good to have a framework for providing information: starting general and moving to more specific. Note that at no time are you at the math or calculation level. I’ve never seen that go well. Solution level: What you’re doing Nothing special here, just input and output.
